resources.string: My name is Forrest, Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump is an absolutely incredible movie that takes you on an unforgettable journey through the life of a simple man with a big heart.\nYou\'ll laugh, you\'ll cry, and you\'ll cheer for Forrest as he navigates through life\'s many challenges and triumphs, all while becoming an unexpected hero in the eyes of those around him.\nForrest Gump is a timeless classic that will leave you feeling uplifted and inspired.
